data.title: Plan and Fund an Event
data.text:
Student Leadership and Involvement is happy to assist students in planning excursions and on- and off-campus events. In order to ensure the success of events, we've provided a list of resources and links regarding the policies and procedures all student-led events must adhere to.

View the 2022-23 RSO Policy to see requirements for programs and events put on by Registered Student Organizations.

Students who want to plan an event that is not associated with a student organization should contact the University Student Senate at [email protected].

Student-led programs must adhere to the policies and procedures of Student Leadership and Involvement and our campus partners. Below is a list of policies and resources with which all groups and individuals planning events must be familiar.
